article_title: Brooklyn’s Science Skills Center HS Banned from Guggenheim for Being ‘Too Rowdy’

og.description: It’s a Guggen-crime. The Upper East Side museum banned a Brooklyn high school for life after its students were deemed too rowdy on a recent visit — a move that some call discipline and others discrimination. A group of about 80 kids from Downtown Brooklyn’s Science [...] Click here to view original web page at nypost.com
